titleStmt.title: Note, that whereas in the returne Quind. Pasce, the number 21 is twice set downe, ...
titleStmt.author: Alleyn, George.
H. A.

notesStmt.note: Title from opening line of text.
Fragment: opening text (in black letter) refers to "Returna brevium" in lines 5 and 9, text followed by two poems (roman type) signed respectively George Alleyn and H.A.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
